parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.5</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
_____________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the additional text (invisible) in the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]] to the given data. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetData''' [idc, index, data] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, data]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> data: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetData''' [index, data] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, data]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER33</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p24 </name>=<value> data: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER34</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetData]] [101, 1, "#1"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetData]] [1, "#1"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
